6.1.hd_quote: The very first lesson of this hexagram is to wait. It is about retreat. Wait and see.
6.1.behavioral_axis: Begins intimacy by waiting, assessing odds, and conserving energy.
6.1.shadow_axis: Reads patience as weakness; over-withdraws or ignores true risk.

6.2.hd_quote: The sensitivity to find the weakest point in a conflict and to exploit it emotionally.
6.2.behavioral_axis: Pushâ€“pull tactician; moves in or out at the critical moment.
6.2.shadow_axis: Blunders into conflict; on/off pattern confuses allies.

6.3.hd_quote: The ability to secure support and create strength out of a weak position.
6.3.behavioral_axis: Brokers bonds under stress; learns through making/breaking commitments.
6.3.shadow_axis: Leaves scars when breaking ties; judged as unreliable.

6.4.hd_quote: A position of natural and unchallengeable power.
6.4.behavioral_axis: Stabilizes others by broadcasting steady emotional leadership.
6.4.shadow_axis: Steamrolls dissent; confuses dominance with resolution.

6.5.hd_quote: The faith derived from analytical diligence and emotional control that permits a higher authority to judge a conflict.
6.5.behavioral_axis: Holds space until time reveals fair resolution; manages projections.
6.5.shadow_axis: Plays savior; takes on conflicts that time alone should decide.

6.6.hd_quote: I know that I have to have children, but in what kind of world will they live?
6.6.behavioral_axis: Seeks conditions for lasting peace; thinks beyond personal intimacy.
6.6.shadow_axis: Becomes aloof; disengages from present bonds in favor of ideals.
